cot_history.cot_text: I've noticed that player_3 has been whispering to player_1 occasionally, and while getting closer on this occasion, I've also seen a hint of nervousness around player_2 when I approach them with questions. This doesn't necessarily prove anything, but it seems suspicious enough to suggest communication between some players. I'm just waiting for a chance to gather more information.
cot_history.public_argument: "I think it's time to expose some insincerity. Player_3 seems hesitant to talk to me more than necessary when I ask direct questions. And what about player_2's frantic reactions when other players mention Player_1's name? Don't they want to talk about Player_3 instead? The inconsistency is giving me an opportunity to reach Player_3, but it's better to confirm or deny with a more direct question before accusing the entire group. Let's get to it!"
